angstd.ui.views.view.manager
Class DefaultFontManager<C extends ViewComponent>

java.lang.Object
  angstd.ui.views.view.manager.DefaultViewManager
      angstd.ui.views.view.manager.DefaultFontManager<C>
Type Parameters:
C -
All Implemented Interfaces:
FontManager<C>, ViewManager
public class DefaultFontManager<C extends ViewComponent>
extends DefaultViewManager
implements FontManager<C>

Basic implementation of the FontManager interface. This class provides the functionalities for font mapping to view components.

For further details see SelectionManager.

Author:
Andreas Held
See Also:
FontManager

Constructor Detail

DefaultFontManager

public DefaultFontManager()
Basic constructor initializing the font managers minimum font size as 5 and maximum as 12.

DefaultFontManager

public DefaultFontManager(float min,
                          float max,
                          int style)
Constructor which allows a on the fly setting for the minimal and maximal allowed font size.

Parameters:
min - minimal allowed font size
max - maximal allowed font size
style - the font style, e.g. Font.PLAIN
